title: The Role of Flexibility and Mobility in Fitness
description: Flexibility and mobility are often overlooked but essential for injury prevention and long-term performance in fitness.

sections.title: Flexibility vs Mobility
sections.content: Flexibility refers to muscle length, while mobility includes joint range of motion and control. Both are needed for safe and effective movement.

sections.title: Improving Mobility in Your Routine
sections.content: Incorporate dynamic stretching before workouts and static stretching afterward. Mobility drills like hip openers and shoulder rotations improve movement quality.

sources.title: ASFA: The Importance of Mobility for Flexibility
sources.author: American Sports & Fitness Association
